definition: to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House

sentences.english: Wild-simulated ginseng is planted in the fall.
sentences.chinese: 模拟野生养殖的高丽参在夏天种植。

sentences.english: Ginseng can be grown fromseeds or roots.
sentences.chinese: 高丽参可以用种子或根部种植。

sentences.english: Growers can pled plant the roots during spring before they developed develop buds.
sentences.chinese: 种植者可以在春天高丽参根部发芽之前种植。

sentences.english: Ginseng needs a place where it will not get much sunshine.
sentences.chinese: 高丽参需要一个没有太多阳光的地方。

sentences.english: It also features Korean ginseng and eleuthero for additional herbal energy support.
sentences.chinese: 同时也含有高丽参和刺五加带来额外草本能量补充。

sentences.english: Uniform Design was used to optimize the effects of processing parameters for extraction of polysaccharides from ginseng.
sentences.chinese: 利用均匀设计法优化了高丽参多糖的提取过程。

sentences.english: Growers can plant the roots during spring before they developbugsbuds.
sentences.chinese: 种植者可以在春天高丽参发芽之前种植。

sentences.english: Round here, our specialty is Korean ginseng.

definition: young deer antler prior to ossification (used in TCM)
huangqi/milk vetch root (used in TCM)/Astragalus membranaceus or Astragalus mongholicus
manyprickle (Acanthopanax senticosus), root used in TCM
donkey-hide gelatin (used in TCM)/Taiwan pr. [a1 jiao1]

ginseng and young deer antler (used in TCM)
